sentences.sContent: Animal cell has a lot of organelle .
sentences.sContent_eng: Animal cell has a lot of organelle .
sentences.sCn: 动物细胞有很多的细胞器官。

sentences.sContent: This paper revealed the pathological changes of tumor cells in the subcellular(organelle) level, and provided the theoretical basis for the diagnosis and treatment of canine mammary tumor.
sentences.sContent_eng: This paper revealed the pathological changes of tumor cells in the subcellular(organelle) level, and provided the theoretical basis for the diagnosis and treatment of canine mammary tumor.
sentences.sCn: 本试验从亚细胞（细胞器）水平上认识和了解细胞的病变，以期为犬乳腺肿瘤疾病的诊断和治疗提供理论依据。

words.tran: [有化] 有机的；组织的；器官的；根本的
有机地；有组织地；器官上地
有机体说；唯器官变化论

trans.tranOther: a structural and functional unit, such as a mitochondrion, in a cell or unicellular organism
